messages.title: A message from your candidate
messages.content: I needed to see an alternative for the people of Hertsmere as well as myself, UKIP ticked all the boxes.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP believes in Local Government by Local Councillors elected by you.

issues.brexitEurope:
52% want to leave the EU
71% want a referendum on the EU
Let the people decide.
issues.governance: The EU will control Local Councils through Regional Government.

leaflet.personalStatement: An individual who has lived in Hertsmere for around thirty years and three years driving almost all around Hertfordshire I have seen quite a number of changes, changes that I see which to be quite honest seem almost clueless as to the reason why. As the saying goes, 'Rome wasn't built in a day', and nor will there be a quick fix with the pace of Hertsmere changing over to UKIP. But, working together we can at least strive one to bring back the Great into Great Britain and eventually succeed.

contactInformation.address: UKIP Hertsmere, 92 Salisbury Road, Borehamwood, Herts, WD6 2JF

images.caption: Campaign leaflet of David Rutter for UK Independence Party with messages and policy highlights.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Parkside Colour Print, 56-62 Waldgrave Road, Bromley, Kent, BR2 0DY. Promoted by David Rutter of 7 Tempest Avenue, Potter Bar, Herts, EN6 5JZ.
